item.title: The Name
item.description: I get asked how I'm supposed to pronounce my name a lot, and the story behind it, so here it is. First, pronunciation: each letter, said one after another, v-c-o-k-l-t-f-r-e. Next, the backstory: although it looks random it's less random than it seems, although it is still, to an extent, random. The letters are actually grouped together on a normal qwerty keyboard, vc okl tfre are all near eachother. That's all the backstory.
